title: The Menu In Yelp's Android App Hides An Awesome Animated Easter Egg
text:
The Menu In Yelp's Android App Hides An Awesome Animated Easter Egg 
Published By: AndroidPolice.com - Today 
A few small extra touches in a user interface can really endear your app to end users. Case in point: local business recommendation app Yelp...
